title: Extreme Dog Fence Dog Fence Wire Splices - Install, Repair or Expand Any In Ground Dog Fence Wire with Electric Fence Wire Splice Kits or Add to Your Dog Fence Wire Repair Kit (8 Pk)
features: 8 WIRE SPLICE KITS: Order Includes 8x Twist on Wire Nuts and 8x Waterproof, Silicone Gel Filled Polypropylene Capsules that Lock Down, and Provide Complete Protection from the Elements
COMPATIBLE: Works Perfectly on All the Following Reputable Electric Dog Fence Brands - Perimeter Technologies , Dogtra , Pet Stop , DogWatch , and ALL Others
GAUGES: These Electric Fence Wire Splice Kits Will Accommodate 20 Gauge, 18 Gauge, 16 Gauge, 14 Gauge, and 12 Gauge Underground Dog Fence Wire Splicing Needs

DIRECTIONS: Strip 1/3" off the Wire Ends. Twist Ends Together (Clockwise). Twist Splice Nut Over Wire Ends. Slide Nut Into Silicone Filled Protective Capsule (All the Way In). Lock Capsule Down on Wire
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We Stand Behind this Product 100%. If You're Not Completely Satisfied with These Splice Kits, You Can Return Them. NO QUESTIONS ASKED
description: 8 Count Professional Series Splice Kit Pack for Inground Fence Systems for Dogs and Puppies

Having the right splicing kit is essential to the performance of any inground pet fence system wiring. Because our splice connectors are fully waterproof, you won't have to worry about moisture getting in and compromising the operation of your underground dog fence. Whether you are setting up a new system, fixing a broken wire, or replacing your existing wire, our splice kit is what you need to get the job done correctly and reliably.When splicing the dog fence wire, all you need to do is twist the two exposed ends together, insert them into the gel-filled capsule and close the splice lock. The cylinder of the underground wire splice contains a mixture of silicone and grease, which helps to secure the waterproof connection.Our wire splice connectors are used to successfully join wire segments in an electric dog fence, but they can also be used to wire an irrigation system, or any low-voltage underground wire application. No matter what you need splices for, you should be able to rely on them to perform indefinitely. Our

brand waterproof splice kits are what you need to have a solid and reliable connection in your system.Here are some of the reputable dog fence brands that our splice kits are completely compatible with: Perimeter Technology Dogtra DogWatch Pet Stop High Tech Pet and ALL other inground pet fence systems
